LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Abhorrent.label: 혐오스러움
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Abhorrent.descrip: To kill an innocent animal is a horrifically inhuman act. Innocent animals are those who are not attacking, or who were only driven to attack by human provocation.
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Disapproved.label: 못마땅함
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Disapproved.descr: To kill an innocent animal is an ugly act. Innocent animals are those who are not attacking, or who were only driven to attack by human provocation.
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Horrible.descript: To kill an innocent animal is a horrible act. Innocent animals are those who are not attacking, or who were only driven to attack by human provocation.
